system.description:
You gain some of the resiliency of your patron, based on the type of genie you chose.

  • Div: You gain resistance to acid damage and immunity to the petrified condition.
  • Djinn: You gain resistance to thunder and lightning damage.
  • Efreet: You gain resistance to fire damage. You may use your reaction when taking fire damage to instead gain immunity. Once you have done so you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
  • Marid: You gain resistance to cold damage and an expertise die on saving throws made to resist being forcibly moved or knocked prone.
